Chrome.Notes:
1. Open Console using `Cmd+Shift+J `(on Mac) or `Ctrl+Shift+J` (on Windows/Linux).
2. Next to the "Clear console" icon in the toolbar, click the "top" menu, and select the iframe to target.
Chrome.Name: Target iframe
